review.title: “I-Novate is Innovation in country”
review.pros: Pros – Good work-life balance here. Great team to work with.Good learning opportunities with real time as well as training sessions time to time.
review.cons: Cons – low employee count in the branches except the headquarter. Head office city is Tier 2 city. Less work from home facility for junior level employees.
review.advice-to-management: Yes, I would recommend this company to a friend – I'm optimistic about the outlook for this company
